dict.acceptation: 在外面；向外面；在户外；露天；
外面；（弯曲路面或轨道的）外道；（靠近路中央的）外侧；（建筑物等的）周围；
外部的；集团外的；（选择余地、可能性等）非常小；可能性最大的；
（表示位置）在[向]…的外面；（表示范围）超出…的范围；（表示排斥）除了（某人）；

sent.orig: The future of philosophy lies outside religion, outside metaphysics, and outside science.
sent.trans: 哲学的未来不在于宗教、形而上学或科学。

sent.orig: There are threats outside of this room, both inside and outside of the Manor.
sent.trans: 这间房外满是威胁，无论庄园内外。

sent.orig: A ceremony was also held outside the Trident hotel as police with sniffer dogs patrolled outside.
sent.trans: 仪式还举行了三叉戟以外的酒店，警察与警犬巡逻之外。

sent.orig: That dog around outside guard the entrance, one swarm stray dog outside the tiger inspects delay.
sent.trans: 那条狗掉头看了看门外，一大群野狗在外面虎视耽耽。

sent.orig: Outside the tribe was outside the law.
sent.trans: 凡是部落以外的，便是不受法律保护的。
